com.rojel.wesv

Class CustomMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rojel.wesv.CustomMetrics

  • public class CustomMetrics
extends java.lang.Object

    Plugin statistics that use Hidendra’s MCStats Metrics library as well as Bastian’s bStats Metrics library and provides extended information for various online graphs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomMetrics(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, Configuration config)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

        public CustomMetrics(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin,
             Configuration config)

        Constructor. Saves references to plugin and its configuration.

        final CustomMetrics customMetrics = new CustomMetrics(yourPluginInstance, WESVConfigurationInstance);
customMetrics.initMetrics();
        Parameters:
        plugin -
        • The plugin for which statistics are being collected.
        config -
